1. Izradite adresnu shemu za 4 lokacije svaka sa 100 
korisnika koristeti A klasu privatnih IP adresa? 

Subnet /25

N: 10.0.0.0
F: 10.0.0.1
L: 10.0.0.126
B: 10.0.0.127

N: 10.0.0.128
F: 10.0.0.129
L: 10.0.0.254
B: 10.0.0.255

N:10.0.1.0
F:10.0.1.1
L: 10.0.1.126
B: 10.0.1.127

N: 10.0.1.128
F: 10.0.1.129
L: 10.0.1.254
B: 10.0.1.255


---------------------------------------------------------

2. Izradite adresnu shemu za n=4 lokacije svaka sa n*100 
korisnika koristeÃ©i A klasu privatnih IP adresa-gdje je n 
broj lokacije? 


A klasa, 10.0.0.0
uvijek se radi prvo s mrezom koja ima najvise kompova
400 /23
SUBNETMASK
255.255.254.0
11111111.11111111.1111111|0.00000000
N: 10.0.0.0
00001010.00000000.0000000|0.00000000
F: 10.0.0.1
00001010.00000000.0000000|0.00000001
L: 10.0.1.254
00001010.00000000.0000000|1.11111110
B: 10.0.1.255
00001010.00000000.0000000|1.11111111


300 /23
SUBNETMASK
255.255.254.0
11111111.11111111.1111111|0.00000000
N: 10.0.2.0
00001010.00000000.0000001|0.00000000
F :10.0.2.1
L: 10.0.3.254
B  10.0.3.255

200/24
255.255.255.0
11111111.11111111.11111111|.00000000
N: 10.0.4.0
00001010.00000000.00000100|.00000000
F:10.0.4.1
00001010.00000000.00000101|.00000001
L:10.0.4.254
00001010.00000000.00000101|.11111110
B:10.0.4.255
00001010.00000000.00000101|.11111111

100 /25
255.255.255.128
11111111.11111111.11111111.1|0000000
N:10.0.5.0
00001010.00000000.00000101.|00000000
F:10.0.5.1
00001010.00000000.00000101.|00000001
L:10.0.5.127
00001010.00000000.00000101.|11111110
B:10.0.5.128
00001010.00000000.00000101.|11111111

-----------------------------------------------------

zad 3.
10.0.0.0/21

-----------------------------------------------------

zad 4.
prvi iz zadace

-----------------------------------------------------

zad 5.
/27 - /20 = 2^7 = broj mreza
1111111.11111111.11110000.00000000

-----------------------------------------------------

zad 6.
DEK 172.23.145.67 /26
BIN 10101100.00010111.10010001.01|000011
SUB 11111111.11111111.11111111.11|000000
N:  10101100.00010111.10010001.01|000000
F:172.23.145.65
10101100.00010111.10010001.01|000001
L:172.23.145.126
10101100.00010111.10010001.01|111110
B:172.23.145.127
10101100.00010111.10010001.01|111111

172.23.145.67 /28
BIN 10101100.00010111.10010001.0100|0011
SUB 11111111.11111111.11111111.1111|0000
N:  172.23.145.64
    10101100.00010111.10010001.0100|0000
F:  172.23.145.65
    10101100.00010111.10010001.0100|0001
L:  172.23.145.68
    10101100.00010111.10010001.0100|1110
B:  172.23.145.69
    10101100.00010111.10010001.0100|1111
    
    
                                                                                     
HAKSD-> 01111111 = 10000000 - 1
10000000 = 128
11000000 = 192
11100000 = 224
11110000 = 240
11111000 = 248
11111100 = 252
11111110 = 254
11111111 = 255
